about_the_game:
Features:

  • High-Octane Gameplay: Experience the rush of intense battles where every shot, dash, and jump counts. With no time to waste, you'll need quick reflexes and sharp tactics to dominate your opponent.

  • Diverse Weapon Arsenal: Choose from an exciting selection of unique weapons, each with its own mechanics and playstyle. Master the shotgun's launch ability, the immense spray off the uzi, and the chaos of explosive bombs.

  • Customizable Characters: Personalize your character with 4 different colors that match your style. Show off your unique look as you battle it out.

  • Dynamic Environments: Fight across a variety of hand-crafted maps, each featuring distinctive visuals, interactive elements, and challenges to keep every match fresh.

  • Seamless Multiplayer: Jump into head-to-head matches with friends or rivals online. Battle Mayhem makes it easy to connect, compete, and settle the score.

  • Stylish Cartoony Graphics: Enjoy the fun and light-hearted visuals designed to keep the focus on gameplay. The colorful, blood-free art style ensures fun for all ages.

  • Custom Game Modes: Choose the number of lives each player starts with and tailor the experience to your preferred intensity. From lightning-fast one-life duels to strategic endurance matches, the choice is yours!

Get Ready to Battle!

Whether you're a casual gamer looking for quick fun or a competitive player aiming to outlast your opponent, Battle Mayhem delivers heart-pounding excitement in every round. Easy to pick up but hard to master, it’s the perfect game to challenge your friends and create unforgettable gaming moments.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (dual-core) or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU or Apple Silicon integrated graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Dive into the action-packed world of Battle Mayhem, a fast-paced multiplayer showdown where strategy, skill, and creativity are your ultimate weapons! Designed for endless fun and fierce competition, Battle Mayhem pits two players against each other in a thrilling fight to be the last one standing.
